response.original_title: A Glimpse Into the Home of Yiddish Author Sholem Ash
response.overview: Ash (November 1, 1880 â€“ July 10, 1957), is a Polish-born Yiddish author who lives and works primarily in Poland and the United States. Before his death, the writer decides to settle in Israel. After his passing, a glimpse is given of his home in the city of Netanya. The writers writing room is seen while writing tools and books are placed on his desk. Also presented is a Certificate of Honor Doctor of Literature, awarded to him by the New York State Beit Midrash.
response.title: A Glimpse Into the Home of Yiddish Author Sholem Ash
